articles.description: On Friday, Anya Taylor-Joy opened up about learning chess for the hit Netflix miniseries, "The Queen's Gambit."
articles.content: Anya Taylor-Joy used different walks and body language to play her character in the Netflix series The Queens Gambit at ages ranging from early teens to early 20s. It was a science experiment for me,… [+2493 chars]

articles.description: Gigi shared a selfie video with the caption 'Back in the office' and in the clip she explained: 'would say back 2 work BUT bein a mama is a job like no otherrrr.'
articles.content:
Her mom Yolanda posted on social media that she was taking care of her baby granddaughter on Thursday.
